name: LIMITS (Giras)
description:
Limits is a game based around, well, pushing through your own limits. You speak to and control a little shadow character and explore this dark and dreary world in which you find yourself.

The game is intended to be a story based top-down game, but with difficult combat. This is NOT a turn based rpg.

Join the discord!  https://discord.gg/33ywp8dM6u
